alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 02 at 1:58AM MDT until November 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult on Highway 14.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
